message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a larger share, but consider the inflation. This offer benefits us both in the long run.
Considering inflation, I'll reduce my share, but still want a bit more than half
Alice, this is a fair offer considering the rapidly increasing inflation. Let's settle this now before it gets any worse.
Inflation is bad for me, I'll reduce again, but can't go much lower
